header.title: Introduction

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The purpose of the OTP_Mibs application is to provide an SNMP management information base for Erlang nodes.

section.title: Pre-requisites
section.p: It is assumed that the reader is familiar with the Erlang programming language, concepts of OTP and has a basic knowledge of SNMP.
